title: Marathon Completion
text: Ran my first marathon in 4:15 after six months of training. Missed two weeks with shin splints but kept at it. Crossing the finish line was the win.

title: Public Speaking Breakthrough
text: Used to freeze during presentations. After a year with Toastmasters, managed to give a talk to about 200 people. Slides crashed halfway but I improvised. The applause at the end felt unreal.

title: Career Pivot Success
text: Taught myself to code while still working full-time in accounting. Built a few rough portfolio projects and eventually landed a junior SWE job. Took about four months of serious nights/weekends study.

title: Team Leadership Under Pressure
text: Led a team of 8 through a product launch during company layoffs. Two engineers left mid-project. We slipped by three days but still shipped one of our best releases.

title: Learning Spanish
text: Picked up Spanish over about 18 months with apps and weekend meetups. Still stumble on tenses, but I can hold my own in conversations now. Even ran a short client call in Spanish last month.

title: Job Interview Success
text: Nailed a tough technical interview after being nervous and worried about it for weeks. Practiced coding problems and behavioral questions daily. The interviewer said my problem-solving approach was impressive and I got the offer the next day.
